column4: How do you do updates in Ubuntu Server 8.04. In the GUI version you can just go to the Update Manager and click install - but whats the command for doing it in the command line version of Ubuntu?
sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get dist-upgrade
macd, IdleOne, ScheissDroge2, danbhfive, thanks a lot!
no, sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get dist-upgrade, apt-get doesn't have safe-upgrade, that's an aptitude thing
